meanings.definition: The act of giving advice or guidance.
meanings.sent1: She sought advisement from her teacher before choosing a college major.
meanings.sent2: It is important to seek advisement from experts when making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The cat asked for advisement from the wise owl on how to catch mice.
meanings.sent4: His heart served as his compass, seeking advisement on matters of love.
meanings.sent5: The old tree provided shelter and advisement to the lost travelers.

meanings.definition: Consideration or deliberation before making a decision.
meanings.sent1: After much advisement, she decided to accept the job offer.
meanings.sent2: The team took advisement from all members before finalizing the project plan.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gave serious advisement to the idea of storing acorns in the mailbox.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed slowly, as if in deep advisement of its next turn.
meanings.sent5: The stars twinkled in the night sky, offering silent advisement to the dreamers below.
